import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput'; import RegistrationForm from '../Components/RegisterForm'; import {Tabs,Tab} from 'react-bootstrap' var newVaccineList = []; var myDisplayList = []; function AddVaccine() { const [noneIsSelected, setNoneIsSelected] = useState(true); const [addVaccineSelected, setAddVaccineSelected] = useState(false); const [addUserSelected, setAddUserSelected] = useState(false); const [titleText, setTitleText] = useState("Add new"); const { value: vaccineValue, bind: bindVaccineValue, reset: resetVaccineValue } = useInput(''); const { value: expirationDateValue, bind: bindExpirationDateValue, reset: resetExpirationDateValue } = useInput(''); const { value: batchNumberValue, bind: bindBatchNumberValue, reset: resetBatchNumberValue } = useInput(''); const { value: quantityValue, bind: bindQuantityValue, reset: resetQuantityValue } = useInput(''); const { value: numberOfDoseValue, bind: bindNumberOfDoseValue, reset: resetNumberOfDoseValue } = useInput(''); const { value: pcvValue, bind: bindPcvValue, reset: resetPcvValue } = useInput(''); const addItemOnList = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); newVaccineList.push({ "trackedEntityType": "yzInaMXBYDb", "orgUnit": "Hjw70Lodtf2", "attributes": [ { //Type "attribute": "QdxqWF42fNB", "value": vaccineValue }, { //expirationDate "attribute": "lVXabcp6jee", "value": expirationDateValue }, { //batchNumber "attribute": "b7OrHNx7qXf", "value": batchNumberValue }, { //Quality "attribute": "yFCnGdrKcZO", "value": quantityValue }, { //Number of dose in flacon "attribute": "BFRA6drf9dV", "value": numberOfDoseValue }, { //pcv status "attribute": "vbr2G0ugn0R", "value": pcvValue }, { //QWlJZRzSPN0 "attribute": "QWlJZRzSPN0", "value": vaccineValue + "_" + batchNumberValue } ], "enrollments": [ { "orgUnit": "Hjw70Lodtf2", "program": "cFFkVcCw1jR", "enrollmentDate": "2020-10-13", "incidentDate": "2020-10-13" } ] }); myDisplayList.push({ "vaccineName": vaccineValue, "expirationDate": expirationDateValue, "quantity": quantityValue, "batch": batchNumberValue }); resetBatchNumberValue(); resetExpirationDateValue(); resetNumberOfDoseValue(); resetPcvValue(); resetQuantityValue(); resetVaccineValue(); console.log(newVaccineList); } return (

{titleText}

{noneIsSelected ?

: addUserSelected ?
: addVaccineSelected ?


{myDisplayList.length > 0 ?

List of new on vaccines



{myDisplayList.map(post => { return ( ) })}
Vaccine name Quantity value Expiration date Batch number
{post.vaccineName} {post.quantity} {post.expirationDate} {post.batch}

: ""}
: "None try another way!"}
) } export default AddVaccine
